SELECT v.VCTN_NO vctnNo, v.EMP_NO empNo, v.VCTN_DAY_CNT vctnDayCnt, (e.EMP_VCTN_TTL - IFNULL(vc.cnt, 0)) vctnRsdCnt, v.VCTN_RSN vctnRsn, v.VCTN_KND_CD vctnKndCd, v.VCTN_ST_CD vctnStCd, v.VCTN_STR_DT vctnStrDt, v.VCTN_END_DT vctnEndDt, v.VCTN_APL_DTM vctnAplDtm, e.EMP_NM empNm, e.EMP_PHN empPhn, e.EMP_VCTN_TTL empVctnTtl, C.CD_VAL_NM AS vctnKndNm, D.CD_VAL_NM AS vctnStNm FROM TB_VACATION v INNER JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE e ON v.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN TB_CODE C ON v.VCTN_KND_CD = C.CD_VAL AND C.CD_ID = 'VCTN_KND_CD' LEFT JOIN TB_CODE D ON v.VCTN_ST_CD = D.CD_VAL AND D.CD_ID = 'VCTN_ST_CD' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(z.VCTN_DAY_CNT), 0) cnt, z.EMP_NO FROM TB_VACATION z WHERE VCTN_ST_CD = '02' GROUP BY z.EMP_NO ) vc on e.EMP_NO = vc.EMP_NO
ORDER BY v.VCTN_NO DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize};

SELECT v.VCTN_NO vctnNo, v.EMP_NO empNo, v.VCTN_DAY_CNT vctnDayCnt, v.VCTN_RSN vctnRsn, v.VCTN_KND_CD vctnKndCd, (e.EMP_VCTN_TTL - IFNULL(vc.cnt, 0)) vctnRsdCnt, v.VCTN_ST_CD vctnStCd, v.VCTN_STR_DT vctnStrDt, v.VCTN_END_DT vctnEndDt, v.VCTN_APL_DTM vctnAplDtm, e.EMP_NM empNm, e.EMP_PHN empPhn, e.EMP_VCTN_TTL empVctnTtl FROM TB_VACATION v INNER JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE e ON v.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO left outer join (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(z.VCTN_DAY_CNT), 0) cnt, z.EMP_NO FROM TB_VACATION z WHERE VCTN_ST_CD = '02' GROUP BY z.EMP_NO) vc on e.EMP_NO = vc.EMP_NO WHERE v.VCTN_NO = #{vctnNo} ORDER BY v.VCTN_NO DESC;
SELECT VCTN_NO vctnNo, EMP_NO empNo, VCTN_DAY_CNT vctnDayCnt, VCTN_RSN vctnRsn, VCTN_RSD_CNT vctnRsdCnt FROM TB_VACATION WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY VCTN_NO DESC LIMIT 1;
